title: To people who know they have bad connection or bad computer
body:
Why do you even bother playing league?
I just got 2 games in a row where they were remakes. What a big waste of time.
But at least I'd rather take a remake than no remake and have an afk.
If you know your computer or internet is garbage and tends to die often, why even bother playing league?
Why not wait till your computer or internet is better?
Because all you are doing is ruining games for others.
